mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NUM AS memNum, MEM_NICKNAME AS memNickName, MEM_TEL AS memTel, MEM_GUBUN AS memGubun, MEM_GRADE AS memGrade, MEM_JOINDATE AS memJoinDate, MEM_UID AS memUid, MEM_STATE AS memState FROM MEMBER
SELECT LINK_NUM AS linkNum, LINK_NAME AS linkName, LINK_URL AS linkUrl FROM EDU_LINKLIST
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_GRADE=#{memGrade} WHERE MEM_NUM=#{memNum}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_State=#{memState} WHERE MEM_NUM=#{memNum}
